template.source:
<!--const Message = {};-->
<!--Message.Label = {};-->
<!--Message.Label.Array = {};-->
Message.Label.Array["#tablename#.TITLE_DETAIL"] = "#entity_desc# 상세";
Message.Label.Array["#tablename#.TITLE_LIST"] = "#entity_desc# 목록";
Message.Label.Array["#tablename#.TITLE_MODIFY"] = "#entity_desc# 수정";
Message.Label.Array["#tablename#.TITLE_REGISTER"] = "#entity_desc# 등록";
#begin#
Message.Label.Array["#tablename#.CHECK.#FIELD_NAME#"] = "#field_desc#(을)를 입력해 주세요";#end#

#begin#
Message.Label.Array["#tablename#.#FIELD_NAME#"] = "#field_desc#";#end#
